rows.label: qst102108_msg0001
rows.name:
Mohohoho! Mushrooms and weapons
now all property of Bamibami!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0002
rows.name: Mo-mo-mo?!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0003
rows.name: You... You startle me!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0004
rows.name:
Bamibami in middle of meal
right now! Shoo, shoo!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0005
rows.name:
M-more details...? Nopon like
mushrooms, what can me say?

rows.label: qst102108_msg0006
rows.name:
Me...me just thought, if me
not defeat Spike Urchon, they
go cause trouble in village.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0017
rows.name:
That give me chance to raid weapon
cache, come here to eat tasty
mushrooms, then make getaway...

rows.label: qst102108_msg0007
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo! NO! Bamibami
not hand over weapons!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0008
rows.name:
Must deliver to Audumbla Mercenaries,
or else forfeit reward!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0009
rows.name:
I see... So the Audumbla
are behind this.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0010
rows.name:
Those one-time aristocrat
mercs have always hated the
way Vandham ran things...

rows.label: qst102108_msg0011
rows.name: But this is below the belt.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0012
rows.name: Too much talk! You! Be gone now!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0013
rows.name:
If you not go now... Me send
weapons and mushrooms up in flame!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0014
rows.name: (What should we do?)

rows.label: qst102108_msg0015
rows.name: Convince him

rows.label: qst102108_msg0016
rows.name: Pay him off

rows.label: qst102108_msg0101
rows.name: If me start a fire here, I die too?

rows.label: qst102108_msg0102
rows.name:
Y-yes, setting fire in small
space maybe dangerous...

rows.label: qst102108_msg0103
rows.name:
In that case, give money!
Mercenary work for money, mo!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0201
rows.name: You give me money? ...How much money?

rows.label: qst102108_msg0301
rows.name:
How much are they offering you for
the weapons and the information?

rows.label: qst102108_msg0303
rows.name: I'll make it 30,000.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0304
rows.name: Oh-ho-ho?! For serious?!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0305
rows.name: I'm buying the weapons, and you.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0306
rows.name:
And you can do whatever you like
with the mushrooms here, too.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0307
rows.name:
Mushrooms! For Bamibami!
Ohhh, me get dizzy!

rows.label: qst102108_msg0308
rows.name:
A good mercenary only acts on
solid information...and money
is something you can trust.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0309
rows.name:
But Vandham had allies he could
rely on without need for money.
Maybe one day, I will too...

rows.label: qst102108_msg0310
rows.name:
Well, at least we've cleared
that up. Sorry I had to
ask so much of you.

rows.label: qst102108_msg0311
rows.name:
Deal is deal! Weapons for you!
And whoop, mushrooms for Bamibami!
Me going to have feeeeast!
